Name: Lux Ex - Legacy
About the game: Lux Ex is a one level game that brings back the classic arcade experience with no save games and limited chances on a vertical scrolling shooter. Can you beat it? Destroy bugs and glitches in your astral body to recover data from the source of the light of your soul. Procedurally Generated Waves Every playthrough is different. Memorizing the levels are not enough, you have to really LEARN how to play; Play it your own way - A wide assortment of weapons and powers that allows you to express yourself through play style; Dynamic difficulty - The game adapts to your skill level, so as you become a better player, the game gets more challenging; . . . .
